name: Thanh-Hai Tran
description: Thanh-Hai Tran is a senior researcher in the Dependable Distributed System team at ConsenSys. His interests are formal methods, distributed systems, cryptography, and blockchains. He has experience in applying formal verification techniques in multiple projects, e.g., the Distributed Validator Technology (DVT), the Three Slot Finality (3SF) protocol, and the C-KZG library.
